column1: Art Institute of Chicago////What my boyfriend and I were able to see during our one day visit was just WOW. There's just something about viewing pieces from 300 B.C. that takes your breath away. How can anything last that long and still look beautiful? Anyway
column2: I know I can go on about how cool
column5: and thought-provoking a lot of the pieces were
column6: but you honestly have to see it for yourself.
